description.value:
Level 1 Enchantment

Casting Time: 1 bonus

Range: 90 feet

Components: V, S, M (the petrified eye of a newt)

Duration: Concentration, up to 1 hour

You place a curse on a creature that you can see within range. Until the spell ends, you deal an extra 1d6 Necrotic damage to the target whenever you hit it with an attack roll. Also, choose one ability when you cast the spell. The target has Disadvantage|XPHB on ability checks made with the chosen ability. If the target drops to 0 Hit Points|XPHB before this spell ends, you can take a Bonus Action|XPHB on a later turn to curse a new creature.

At Higher Levels: Your Concentration|XPHB can last longer with a spell slot of level 2 (up to 4 hours), 3-4 (up to 8 hours), or 5+ (24 hours).
